title: Will I still get a chest from my S while the hextech system is busted?
body: I just got an S on lulu and was wondering, because i didnt see the pop up and cant view the crafting screen, if i would still get the chest

replies.body: Unless specified by the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, hextech crafting materials should still appear after a match even if it's inaccessible in the client.  Everything should be fine now, anyway!
Yeah, it's there now. Now my only problem is having 4 boxes with 2 key frags. Feelsbadman

You probably will get a chest for that champion, unless you've already gotten a chest for that champion, you won't get one. This bug is not directly affecting Hextech Crafting so there shouldn't be issues with that.
